definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: This paper presents an improved scheme of rotor position estimation for PMSM.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种永磁同步电动机转子位置估算的改进方法。

sentences.english: This paper presents a field-oriented vector control system for permanent magnet synchronous motor.
sentences.chinese: 本文阐述了永磁同步电动机磁场定向矢量控制系统。

sentences.english: The small battery-powered motor is assembled in the cap, which features a hot foil decoration.
sentences.chinese: 小型电池供电的电动机组装帽，采用了热箔装饰。

sentences.english: Alternating current motor is the important power equipment applicated in various fields.
sentences.chinese: 交流电动机是广泛用于各领域的重要动力设备。

sentences.english: The motor of frequently reversible discharging equipment is very easy to be burnt out.
sentences.chinese: 频繁可逆运转卸料设备，其电动机极易烧毁。

sentences.english: The alternating current excitation motor (ACEM) is a kind of novel adjustable speed motor by changing frequency.
sentences.chinese: 交流励磁电动机是一种新颖的变频调速电动机。

sentences.english: The alternating current excitation motor (ACEM) is a kind of novel adjustable speed motor by changing frequency.
sentences.chinese: 交流励磁电动机是一种新颖的变频调速电动机。

sentences.english: YZRE YZE series electromagnetic braking motors for crane and metallurgical uses.
sentences.chinese: YZE系列起重及冶金用电磁制动电动机。

sentences.english: Nonlinear L2 robust control for bearing less permanent magnet synchronous motors (BPMSM) was presented.
sentences.chinese: 对无轴承永磁同步电动机提出非线性L2鲁棒控制。

sentences.english: We've laid away some electric motors for this people's commune.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经为这个人民公社保留起几台电动机了。
也可以考虑购买伺服电动机。

sentences.english: High school or technical school degree. Be able to use the electric instrument correctly.
sentences.chinese: 高中及技术学校以上，能正确使用电动机具。

sentences.english: This heavy freighter is driven by two electric motors.
sentences.chinese: 这辆重型运输汽车是由两台电动机驱动的。

sentences.english: Would you please inspect the motor and pumps?
sentences.chinese: 请检查一下电动机与泵浦，好吗？

sentences.english: Drive uses one three-phase induction motor per pillar.
sentences.chinese: 每根柱都使用一个三相感应电动机进行驱动。

sentences.english: Shall we inspect the next one ?
sentences.chinese: 我们检查下一个电动机好吗？

definition: power output (of an electrical device etc)
